metadata.name: iTopia
metadata.description:
$10 Open Edition! 

One lucky minter will win 50% of the ETH generated from the 48 hour mint. 

How you may ask? 

Step 1: Mint iTopia piece 

Step 2: Create derivative artwork using iTopia and upload your creation to twitter! make sure you tag @MrCannon0x in your post 

Step 3: Artwork with the most likes will win half of the funds generated from the mint once the OE window has closed 

Step 4: Minters can burn the original iTopia piece for the winning artwork! 

Goodluck!!
